panel.name: body
panel.component: Submit your artwork to be featured on the home page of Rennder.com

First, download template-artwork.psd.

Rules: 

  1. The artwork must be submitted at 1920x420 resolution, in PNG format, with a transparent background. 
  2. Do not include the Rennder logo, action buttons, or slogan in the artwork.
  3. The artwork must be designed using a semi-transparent white ink ranging from 5% to 30%.
  4. The cell phone must stay exactly where it is, but the web page conveyed inside the cell phone can be changed to match your idea.
  5. The artwork can expand down to the two action buttons & slogan, but must not confuse the viewer as to what is clickable.
  6. The artwork can overlap the RENNDER logo, but must not confuse the viewer as to what is part of the logo and what is not.
 
When you have completed your artwork, send the PNG image file via email to info@rennder.com with the subject titled "Artwork"
